Class LibraryLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.LibraryLogic

  • public class LibraryLogic
extends Object
    Handles filtering and sorting of the library

      • LibraryLogic

        public LibraryLogic()

    • Method Detail

      • filterLibrary

        public static ArrayList<Movie> filterLibrary(String filterType,
                                             String filterQuery)
        Calls on the appropriate MapSearchLogic function using the correct starter map. Only used when starting a new filtering, as it uses static maps to start
        Parameters:
        filterType - What movie attribute to search through (e.g. Title, Genre)
        filterQuery - What to search for within that attribute (e.g. Brad Pitt for Actors)
        Returns:
        List of movies that match the filter query pair

      • filterMovieList

        public static ArrayList<Movie> filterMovieList(ArrayList<Movie> movieList,
                                               String filterType,
                                               String filterQuery)
        Calls on the appropriate MapSearchLogic function passing in the previous movie list to sort and the correct getter method name
        Parameters:
        movieList - List of movies to apply the filters to
        filterType - What movie attribute to search through (e.g. Title, Genre)
        filterQuery - What to search for within that attribute (e.g. Brad Pitt for Actors)
        Returns:
        List of movies that match the filter query pair

      • sortMovieList

        public static ArrayList<Movie> sortMovieList(ArrayList<Movie> movieList,
                                             String sortType,
                                             boolean sortDescending)
        Calls on SortLogic sortList
        Parameters:
        movieList - List of movies to sort
        sortType - What to sort by (e.g. Title, Rating)
        sortDescending - Whether to sort ascending or descending
        Returns:
        Sorted list of movies as specified by the input
